text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- King Hassan meets delegation of hotel group Accor which plans to set up a $100 million international fund to upgrade current tourism projects.
- Journalists union holds two-day general assembly.
- Human Rights Organisation calls for lifting the ban on weekly newspaper Al-Oussbou Assahafi.
- Socialist MPs ask government to withdraw draft law shaping state-owned telecommunications utility.
